author: Shifter4Nature

posts.content:
Hello!

It's time for another OC playthrough. That's why I wanted to ask you about these few concepts. Personally I think Dr(11)Shi(3)Ba(4) would be most optimal, while monk splits could be a little stronger (no umd, no taunt but cleave, evasion, AC bonus and KD/IKD for Monk(6) split), but I'm no expert so I need your insights. I know it could be hard before minotaur shape but if i keep my distance with a ranged weapon and send Daelan as a tank, it should be ok i hope.

EDIT: Any advices for equipment except of dark moon robe and sun soul boots?

posts.content:
Some comments about the equip:
Why do you need so much +INT? Instead of that Thayvian Circlet grab a Golden Circlet, that gives you mind immunity. Also there are many better options on your second ring than that +5 INT ring. For example any of the hench rings, ring of yusam, ring of resistance, ring of regen, ring of the wood elves.
The rest is mostly okay, however I would choose some better shield. Maybe the Mithral Shield, a small shield with freedom, or the Uthgardt Holy Shield, a large shield with +2 STR and -2 CHA. You can also try to find the Hastsezini's Shield. That is a tower which only gives +5 AC, but with this you can ignore the +AC mods on other items if you plan to play polymorphed most of the time.
Also it is advised to keep some situational items with you, like the greater damage resist belts (15/- resist on one type of physical damage), and there are some immunities that can be handy in some situations, like death, poison , etc.

EDIT: oh, I almost forgot. Ofc the gloves slot never merges, but the ogre power gauntlets could be useful for carrying more weight when you are in your human form :)
